txt.en: Tower of Orthanc: Ring of Acid -- Tier 1

Saruman's evil has broken all boundaries of the Order of Wizards. Seeking to create more twisted creatures, he sealed many Orcs, Wargs, and Dunlendings in a chamber filled with acids and many vile poisons. Add a lesser ring of power, and the result was terrifying.

You have claimed the Ring of Acid
